segments.advisor_message: Okay, so just to recap some of the details we've talked about so far, your first name is Alex, right?
segments.client_message: Yeah, that’s right, it’s Alex. But I usually go by Al with my friends and family.

segments.advisor_message: Great! And what about your last name? I believe it's Taylor?
segments.client_message: Yes, that's it. It's Taylor. Just like the famous singer!

segments.advisor_message: Perfect, Alex Taylor. Now, can you confirm your date of birth for me? I think you mentioned it was in May, correct?
segments.client_message: Yeah, I was born on the fifteenth of May, uh, 1990. So, I'm thirty-three now.
